logo_svg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 160" role="img" aria-label="Universitaetsspital Schwanensee"><defs><linearGradient id="us-bg" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#0f766e"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#99f6e4"/></linearGradient></defs><rect width="180" height="160" rx="16" fill="url(#us-bg)"/><g transform="translate(28,26)"><path d="M36 62c20-16 36-12 52 0 10 8 20 8 28 0-6 16-20 24-38 24H52c-16 0-26-10-16-24Z" fill="#eafffb"/><rect x="8" y="24" width="16" height="48" rx="6" fill="#99f6e4"/><rect x="4" y="40" width="24" height="16" rx="4" fill="#99f6e4"/></g><text x="90" y="140" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Inter, Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="700" fill="#053f37">Universitaetsspital Schwanensee</text></svg>

name: Kanton Arvenfels Amt fuer Kultur und Medien
description: Cantonal office for culture and media with grants portal and archives.
logo_svg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 180 160" role="img" aria-label="Kanton Arvenfels Amt fuer Kultur und Medien"><defs><linearGradient id="ak-bg" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1f2937"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#fde68a"/></linearGradient></defs><rect width="180" height="160" rx="16" fill="url(#ak-bg)"/><g transform="translate(28,24)"><rect x="0" y="18" width="60" height="48" rx="8" fill="#fff7e1" opacity="0.6"/><path d="M8 74h44" stroke="#1f2937" stroke-width="3" opacity="0.3"/><circle cx="112" cy="54" r="22" fill="#fde68a"/><path d="M102 54h20M112 44v20" stroke="#1f2937" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/></g><text x="90" y="140" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Inter, Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="700" fill="#1f2937">Arvenfels Kultur & Medien</text></svg>
